## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5d7c8b06f4e363cde4609c5bb2971268a310ec0ec691464f7c1159191f308b8c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ing-feat-lu-luxtrust-token-authentication' @ 200.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
